project_plan.name: Python-Based Quiz Game
project_plan.description: Design and implement a Python-based quiz game that asks the user multiple-choice questions and tracks the user's score.

task.name: Define the questions and answers in a variable
Implement the function to display questions and accept user input
Implement scoring system to track the user's score
Implement the final score display at the end of the game
Write tests for the quiz game's functionality
Execute tests on all implemented features to ensure they function correctly
